architectural_elements.name: Vaulted Ceiling
architectural_elements.description: High arched ceiling with cracked frescoes and flaking paint, once depicting celestial scenes now obscured by grime.

architectural_elements.name: Marble Flooring
architectural_elements.description: Cold, polished tiles streaked with age, some broken or marked by mysterious stains.

architectural_elements.name: Tall Windows
architectural_elements.description: Long windows covered by tattered curtains, letting in diffused moonlight that glints off the marble.

architectural_elements.name: Display Alcoves
architectural_elements.description: Recessed wall sections housing sculptures, each dimly lit and cloaked in dust.

architectural_elements.name: Grand Archway Entrance
architectural_elements.description: An ornate archway leading into the gallery, adorned with cracked cherubs and chipped molding.

furniture_and_decor.name: Framed Paintings
furniture_and_decor.description: Portraits, landscapes, and surreal pieces hanging askew; some eyes move subtly when viewed directly.

furniture_and_decor.name: Pedestals and Sculptures
furniture_and_decor.description: Stone and marble statues of unknown figures, some missing limbs or heads, standing in eerie stillness.

furniture_and_decor.name: Display Tables
furniture_and_decor.description: Velvet-covered tables holding small artifacts, vases, and broken picture frames.

furniture_and_decor.name: Benches
furniture_and_decor.description: Wooden benches arranged along the center of the hall, worn smooth by time, one overturned.

furniture_and_decor.name: Velvet Ropes
furniture_and_decor.description: Frayed ropes cordoning off certain exhibits, posts leaning at odd angles.

atmospheric_details.name: Dust Particles
atmospheric_details.description: Fine motes suspended in the air, illuminated by faint moonbeams.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Thick webs stretching across frames and statues, suggesting long abandonment.

atmospheric_details.name: Faint Whispering
atmospheric_details.description: Soft murmurs and sighs that seem to echo from the paintings themselves.

atmospheric_details.name: Cold Drafts
atmospheric_details.description: Sudden currents of air that disturb hanging fabrics and cause candle flames to bend.

atmospheric_details.name: Eerie Silence
atmospheric_details.description: An unnatural quiet punctuated only by creaks and distant drips of water.

interactive_objects.name: Cursed Painting
interactive_objects.description: A large portrait whose expression subtly changes when the player looks away; may hide a mechanism or clue.

interactive_objects.name: Broken Frame
interactive_objects.description: An empty frame lying on the floor, concealing a small key or hidden compartment beneath.

interactive_objects.name: Movable Statue
interactive_objects.description: A heavy sculpture that can be rotated or pushed to reveal a secret passage or trigger a puzzle.

interactive_objects.name: Art Catalog Book
interactive_objects.description: A dusty ledger listing artworks and their owners, with certain entries ominously crossed out.

interactive_objects.name: Hidden Safe
interactive_objects.description: A small safe embedded behind a painting, requiring a code found within the gallery’s clues.

environmental_effects.name: Creaking Floorboards
environmental_effects.description: Soft groans and clicks as if footsteps are echoing your own.

environmental_effects.name: Shifting Shadows
environmental_effects.description: Moving silhouettes cast by unseen light sources, suggesting figures walking just out of view.

environmental_effects.name: Blinking Portraits
environmental_effects.description: Certain paintings blink or glance sideways when the player isn’t looking directly at them.

environmental_effects.name: Cracking Canvas
environmental_effects.description: The sound of canvas stretching and tearing in the silence, though no damage appears visible.

environmental_effects.name: Spectral Figure
environmental_effects.description: A faint ghostly figure visible in reflections or paintings, vanishing when approached.

lighting.name: Wall Lamps
lighting.description: Old brass sconces flickering weakly, their bulbs buzzing with static energy.

lighting.name: Moonlight
lighting.description: Pale light streaming through windows, illuminating statues and glinting off marble.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: Clusters of candles around certain exhibits, their flames unnaturally still.

lighting.name: Spotlights
lighting.description: Old electric spotlights aimed at paintings, some flickering or turning on unexpectedly.
